OVRL SDK documentation
=======================

Developer-friendly helpers and Soroban tooling for the OVRL token on Stellar.
These docs cover installation, environment setup, common workflows, and the
complete Python API surface.

.. note::
   The SDK is fully asynchronous and all API methods use `asyncio` under the hood.

Contents
--------

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Guides

   getting-started

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Reference

   api
